# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(s)
    lines = []

    current_line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(current_line * " " * word) <= text_width
            current_line = string(current_line, " ", word)
        else
            push!(lines, lstrip(current_line))
            current_line = word
        end
    end

    push!(lines, current_line)

    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage:
s = "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed at ligula vel nunc blandit euismod."
print(wrap_string(s))
```
